sources.name: CustomerInput
sources.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		CustomerName as string,
		ContactNum as string,
		Country as string,
		OrderDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CustomerInput

sources.name: OrdersInput
sources.script:
source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerName as string,
		Country as string,
		OrderDate as string,
		Product as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> OrdersInput

sinks.name: CustomerOrderOutputSink
sinks.script:
CustomerOrderFullOuterJoin sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		ContactNum,
		OrderID,
		CustomerName = OrdersInput@CustomerName,
		Country = OrdersInput@Country,
		OrderDate = OrdersInput@OrderDate,
		Product
	)) ~> CustomerOrderOutputSink

transformations.name: CustomerOrderFullOuterJoin
transformations.script:
CustomerInput, OrdersInput join(CustomerInput@CustomerName == OrdersInput@CustomerName,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> CustomerOrderFullOuterJoin
